channel.title: CVE Feed for Secomea -- SiteManager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Secomea -- SiteManager

item.title: CVE-2020-29027|2024-08-04T16:48:00.931Z -- secomea -- sitemanager
item.description: Cross-site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in GUI of Secomea SiteManager could allow an attacker to cause an XSS Attack. This issue affects: Secomea SiteManager all versions prior to 9.3.

item.title: CVE-2020-29020|2024-08-04T16:48:00.791Z -- secomea -- sitemanager
item.description: Improper Access Control vulnerability in web service of Secomea SiteManager allows remote attacker to access the web UI from the internet using the configured credentials. This issue affects: Secomea SiteManager All versions prior to 9.4.620527004 on Hardware.
